Description: This web service reads unsigned medication order information from a patient's chart. This web service is currently designed for use only with CDS Hooks integrations and should not be used for other purposes. See Epic's CDS Hooks specification for more information on creating an integration that utilizes CDS Hooks.

MedicationRequest.Name: MedicationRequest
MedicationRequest.Description: An instance of the R4 MedicationRequest FHIR resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
The category of the medication request.

Supported categories:
  • inpatient
  • outpatient
  • community
  • discharge

dispenseRequest.Name: dispenseRequest
dispenseRequest.Description: Parameter group containing information about the dispense.

expectedSupplyDuration.Name: expectedSupplyDuration
expectedSupplyDuration.Description: Number of days supply is expected to last.

numberOfRepeatsAllowed.Name: numberOfRepeatsAllowed
numberOfRepeatsAllowed.Description: Value for number of refills allowed for this medication.

validityPeriod.Name: validityPeriod
validityPeriod.Description: Dispense duration timeline. Includes start date and end date.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: Returns “plan” for historical medications. Returns “order” for other medications.

medicationReference.Name: medicationReference
medicationReference.Description: Reference to the Medication resource for this unsigned order.

priorPrescription.Name: priorPrescription
priorPrescription.Description: Reference to the MedicationRequest resource which the current unsigned order was reordered from.

reportedBoolean.Name: reportedBoolean
reportedBoolean.Description: Determines whether the order is historical.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to the Patient resource for the MedicationRequest.
